ArshuContent.Info: Arshu Consultancy was a boutique consultancy created by husband and wife team to execute a multi million dollar Trademark and Company Registration project for the AGC Office of Brunie Government as Insourcing Contractor for I-magination Solutions.
After that the company specialized mainly in doing freelance integration projects integrating Software with Software and Software with Hardware
Some of the Past Software Integration projects done are integrating Microsoft Business Central for implementing Warehouse Management, Order Management, Logistics Management, Print Management etc
Some of the Past Hardware Integration projects done are integraing LS Retail POS/Custom POS with NETS/OCBC/AliPay/Wechat Payment Systems, Glory/WinCor Cash Machine, etc

HilightedContent: Currently developing Serverless App Hosting solutions using fly.io
